index.title: Welcome to DiaGoals - your diabetes journey partner!
index.greeting: DiaGoals is your go-to app for managing diabetes, specially designed for kids and teens. Set health goals, track your progress, and take control of your well-being. We're here to make managing diabetes easier, more engaging, and empowering for you.
index.cta: Join us in taking charge of your health!

tutorial.title: Let’s set your first goal!
tutorial.greeting: Hi, I'm a capybara! I'm here to help you use this app, set goals, track your progress and receive achievement badges.
tutorial.content: Fun fact: Capybaras are very friendly and don’t mind other animals using them as furniture. They happily let birds, rabbits and even monkeys sit on their backs.
tutorial.cta: Click on the "+" button to get started.

field.duration: For how long do you want this to be your goal?
field.goalType: Is this a daily goal or a weekly goal?
field.reminder: When would you like to be reminded?

goalAction.markAsDoneConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to mark your goal as done?
goalAction.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your goal?

label.betterThan: You are doing better than {betterThan}% of users
